questions.question: What is the meaning of "Two heads are better than one"?

choices.answer: Unhappy people try to make others unhappy.
Giving gifts is more satisfying than getting them.
It is always better to tell the truth.
Sharing your problem can help you solve it.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "Many hands make light work"?

choices.answer: The more people that help, the easier the job will be.
It is always better to tell the truth.
It is nice to hold hands.
Sometimes you just can't win.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "Honesty is the best policy."

choices.answer: Saving money is a good way to make money.
Policies should be read over before signed.
It is always best to tell the truth.
Good times can't last forever.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "Actions speak louder than words?"

choices.answer: Getting enough sleep will make you healthy.
What you do is more important than what you say.
People who can't speak  aren't loud.
If you are smart, you will take  a warning.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "When one door shuts, another opens?"

choices.answer: There will always be new opportunities.
Second chances are always rare.
Two things that appear similar  can be opposite.
When life gets hard, let someone else take over.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "When it rains, it pours?"

choices.answer: The wetter you get, the harder it rains.
Light sprinkles usually turn into big storms.
When one bad thing happens, they keep happening.
When things are bad, remember those who have it worse.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today?"

choices.answer: Be lazy and enjoy life.
Tomorrow is the time to do all of your stuff.
Calendars are the best gift.
If you can do something today, do it today.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "Two wrongs don't make a right?"

choices.answer: If you only do something bad once, you are right!
If someone wronged you, getting revenge will make it worse.
If you are wrong twice, you really don't know anything.
Do something nice and you will be wrong.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "The squeaky wheel gets the grease?"

choices.answer: Cars that are bad need fixed.
Squeaky wheels don't work.
Mice squeak like wheels.
People who complain usually get more attention.

questions.question: What is the meaning of "You can't judge a book by its cover?"

choices.answer: Covers on books can fade.
People who look mean are always mean.
You can't make decisions based on looks alone.
Be patient. Good things will happen to you.
